Testing A Reportlab Bug
=======================

This is from our issue 544.  The test will fail with a known bug on versions of reportlab earlier than 3.3.8.  For the tests to pass, the two very similar tables below should be displayed similarly.

Software Notes
--------------

+-------------+-----------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Software    | Version                                       | Notes                                                                                                                      |
+=============+===============================================+============================================================================================================================+
| Ubuntu      | 15.04 (Vivid Vervet) or 15.10 (Wily Werewolf) | Full-on systemd support. Investigate 16.04 LTS (Xenial Xerus) in April, being wary of Python versions and Snappy packages. |
+-------------+-----------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| debootstrap | >= 1.0.77                                     | Generate filesystems for containers.                                                                                       |
+-------------+-----------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
